name: TAPP FIGHTER !!!
description:
TAPP FIGHTER !!! It is currently in development. 

I could not implement several things that I would have liked and I think they would have been good for the game, such as the animations in the victories of each character, voice effects, a referee who starts the count, and an intro that introduces the two fighters, but it could not be :(

 LITTLE BUGS: 

* Infinite rounds.

* It does not show the maximum score when you win the fight.

* The character sometimes stands up alone, that eliminates the action of quickly pressing the button suddenly.

* Button does not work on PC (use "K" key).
